TopicTitle: Can I dock a Clamp o tron Junior into a regular one?

Articles.Content: Nope. Jr only docks to other Jr's, but the standard clamp-o-tron, the shielded version, and the in-line version can all be docked with each other
I think clamp O-Tron Juniors are meant to be used with probes and such. So you could dock probes onto something without a big ridiculous docking port on the front.
